tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (DT A) (NN family) (NN day)) (VP (VBD was) (VP (ADVP (JJ much)) (VBN needed))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [needed/VBN nsubjpass>[day/NN det>A/DT compound>family/NN] auxpass>was/VBD advmod>much/JJ punct>./.]

tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (NP (NP (JJ thankful)) (PP (IN for) (NP (DT the) (JJ first) (NNP Friday))) (ADVP (RP off) (PP (IN in) (NP (QP (RB almost) (CD 2)) (NNS months)))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [thankful/JJ nmod:for>[Friday/NNP case>for/IN det>the/DT amod>first/JJ] advmod>[off/RP nmod:in>[months/NNS case>in/IN nummod>[2/CD advmod>almost/RB]]] punct>./.]
